## QwikSpeakExtractOptions interface

Qwik Speak Extract Options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QwikSpeakExtractOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [assetsPath?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.assetspath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Path to translation files: \[basePath\]/\[assetsPath\]/\[lang\]/\*.json. Default to 'public/i18n' |
|  [basePath?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.basepath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The base path. Default to './' |
|  [format?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.format.md) |  | 'json' | <i>(Optional)</i> The format of the translation files. Default to 'json' |
|  [keySeparator?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.keyseparator.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Separator of nested keys. Default is '.' |
|  [keyValueSeparator?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.keyvalueseparator.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Key-value separator. Default is '<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->' |
|  [sourceFilesPath?](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.sourcefilespath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Path to files to search for translations. Default to 'src' |
|  [supportedLangs](./extract.qwikspeakextractoptions.supportedlangs.md) |  | string\[\] | Supported langs. Required |
